content:
Russian invaders are a successful experience of using Baggy and Cadrocycles on the battlefield.

It seems that the invaders begin to systematically supply these means of transportation at the state level.

On thisI paid attentionA spokesman for the 80th separate landing brigade Roman Gasko during a stream on the TV army.

- Now they are getting an increase in these remedies on the battlefield at the state level. We see different Chinese buggies and everything else. They learn a lot from our technology, - he said.

Armyinform alreadyreportedthat the enemy moved on the Baggy in Kupyansk direction, and in the defense forcestoldabout the specifics of the use of the Russian ATVs.
title: The occupiers at the state level receive buggy
description: It seems that the invaders begin to systematically supply these means at the state level ...
author: Army Inform
